title: How RFK Could Smash the Two-Party System
description:
Could RFK smash the two-party system in this year's US election? The one-time Democrat now-independent scion of America's most famous political dynasty already leads the under-35s and could deny Trump or Biden a majority.

The post How RFK Could Smash the Two-Party System appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Diversity Row Erupts at National AI Institute After 180 Staff Sign Letter Questioning “Inclusivity” of Hiring Four Male Scientists
description:
A diversity row has erupted at the U.K.'s national AI institute after 180 staff signed a letter questioning the "inclusivity" of the appointment of four male senior scientists.

The post Diversity Row Erupts at National AI Institute After 180 Staff Sign Letter Questioning “Inclusivity” of Hiring Four Male Scientists appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Will The North Face Be the Next Victim of ‘Go Woke, Go Broke’?
description:
The North Face has become the latest company to deploy woke nonsense on its unsuspecting customers by insisting they complete a 'racial inclusion course' if they want to benefit from a 20% discount.

The post Will The North Face Be the Next Victim of ‘Go Woke, Go Broke’? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: NHS Crisis: Doctors Up 37% and Support Staff Up 45% in 10 Years – How Does the NHS Do So Little With So Much?
description:
The NHS seems to be in permanent crisis. Yet the number of doctors is up 37% and non-medical support staff up 45% in 10 years. How does a health service do so little with so much?

The post NHS Crisis: Doctors Up 37% and Support Staff Up 45% in 10 Years – How Does the NHS Do So Little With So Much? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Lee Anderson Defects from Conservatives to Reform U.K.
description:
Lee Anderson has announced he is defecting from the Conservative party, from which he is currently suspended, to Reform U.K.

The post Lee Anderson Defects from Conservatives to Reform U.K. appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Three Tory Ex-Home Secretaries Warn Against Politicising Anti-extremism
description:
Counter-terror and extremism experts, including former Conservative home secretaries, are warning against exploiting extremism for political gain ahead of Michael Gove's controversial new anti-extremism plan.

The post Three Tory Ex-Home Secretaries Warn Against Politicising Anti-extremism appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Arctic Sea Ice, Polar Bears and Great Barrier Reef Return to the Headlines in Misinformation Blitzkrieg
description:
It's 'whack-a-mole' time as alarmists revive classic climate tropes such as ice-free Arctic summers, starving Polar bears and the disappearing Great Barrier Reef, none of which are true.

The post Arctic Sea Ice, Polar Bears and Great Barrier Reef Return to the Headlines in Misinformation Blitzkrieg appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: News Round-Up
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
